# GitHub Test Secrets - FAKE VALUES FOR TESTING ONLY
# These match patterns in pkg/rule/rules/github.yml

# GitHub Personal Access Token (np.github.1)
# Pattern: \b(ghp_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36})\b
GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# GitHub OAuth Access Token (np.github.2)
# Pattern: \b(gho_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36})\b
oauth_token: gho_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# GitHub App Token (np.github.3)
# Pattern: \b((?:ghu|ghs)_[a-zA-Z0-9]{36})\b
GH_APP_TOKEN=ghs_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# GitHub Refresh Token (np.github.4)
# Pattern: \b(ghr_[a-zA-Z0-9]{76})\b
refresh_token: ghr_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# GitHub Fine-grained PAT (np.github.7)
# Pattern: \b(github_pat_[0-9a-zA-Z_]{82})\b
FINE_GRAINED_TOKEN=github_pat_11AAAAAA0xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
